items.question: How does copy trading work?
items.answer: Copy trading allows you to automatically copy the operations of professional traders, replicating their strategies in your own account.

items.question: Can I cancel at any time?
items.answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time without cancellation fees or commitment.

items.question: Are Expert Advisors safe?
items.answer: All our EAs undergo rigorous testing and are verified by our technical team before being made available.

items.question: What technical support is available?
items.answer: We offer email support for all plans, priority support for the Professional plan and 24/7 support for the Enterprise plan.

items.question: Can I use my own VPS?
items.answer: Yes, you can use your own VPS or purchase one of our plans. We offer discounts for Enterprise plan customers.
